quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sheila and Harvey
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, sample, singles. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the song Harvey and Sheila, Harvey and Sheila fell in love and picked a wedding ring. When or where did they get married?

options.text: on a slow boat to China

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in the spring

questions.question: On 21 December 2005 it was announced that this member had left the Sugababes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mutya Buena

questions.question: In 2003 Sugababes released the single Shape which featured a sample from a 1993 song by this celebrated musician.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sting

questions.question: Complete the lines from the song Harvey and Sheila: Sheila shopped at  _______. Harvey bought a used  ______.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: AP - MG

questions.question: With the release of this single in September 24, 2007, Sugababes became the first girl band to top the UK Singles Chart based solely on downloads.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: About You Now

questions.question: Why did Siobhán Donaghys leave Sugababes in 2001?

options.text: She felt successful enough to start a solo career.
She was exhausted from the fights within the group.
She wanted to pursue a fashion career.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was exhausted from the fights within the group.

questions.question: What is the name of Sugababes sixth studio album, released on October 20, 2008?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catfights and Spotlights

questions.question: What was the first Sugababes single that reached a number one position in the United Kingdom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Freak Like Me

questions.question: In the song Harvey and Sheila, Sheila works at B.B.D. O and handles the PBX doing what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: writing checks

questions.question: Which of these singles by Sugababes has reached a number one position in the United Kingdom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Allan Shermans song Harvey and Sheila is a parody of Hava Nagila, a traditional folk song associated with this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Israel

questions.question: Where did Harvey and Sheila meet and fall in love in the song Harvey and Sheila?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in an elevator

questions.question: Which of these is not one of the three original members of the Sugababes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heidi Range

questions.question: What single by Sugababes was featured in the soundtrack of the 2003 movie Love Actually?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Too Lost In You

questions.question: Complete these lines from Allan Shermans song Harvey and Sheila: Harveys a CPA, He works for IBM, He went to ________  and got his ____________.  Fill in the blanks with the school and what he received from that school.

options.text: Sam Houston Institute of Technology - Teacher Under Regular Detention

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: MIT - PhD

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sheila and Harvey

questions.question: Which of these songs is not recorded on Kelly Clarksons album Stronger, which won the Grammy Award Best Pop Vocal Album in 2013?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Know It All

questions.question: What organisation did Harvey and Sheila join after Bea and Kay were born in the song Harvey and Sheila?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: PTA

questions.question: In the song Harvey and Sheila, they went to Europe using what charge card?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: VISA

questions.question: Who won the Grammy Award for Best Pop Solo Performance at the 55th Annual Grammy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adele

questions.question: Who financed the house Harvey and Sheila bought in the self-titled song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: FHA

questions.question: In Allan Shermans song, Harvey and Sheila borrowed some money from HFC and bought some stock in ATT then they both worked for the campaign election of who?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: JFK

questions.question: The Black Keys won the Grammy Awards for Best Rock Performance and Best Rock Song for Lonely Boy, which was the opening track from this album.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: El Camino

questions.question: In the song Harvey and Sheila, Harvey and Sheila decided to pack up and move to where and how?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: West La - TWA

questions.question: What singer is featured in the Grammy Award-winning song by singer-songwriter Gotye?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kimbra

questions.question: In Allan Shermans song, Harvey and Sheila got a charge card from Macys and Bought a layette, pink and lacy. What children did they have?

options.text: no children so they bought a couple of pygmy pigs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: twin baby girls

questions.question: In Allan Shermans song Harvey and Sheila, Allan got rid of his old MG and bought an XKE and they also switched their allegiance to what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: GOP

questions.question: After their shopping adventures Harvey and Sheila from the self-titled song went home and watched TV on what brand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: RCA

questions.question: Name British indie folk band whose second studio album, Babel, won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 2013.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mumford  Sons

questions.question: What is the title of the song by Fun which won the Grammy Award for Song of the Year in 2013?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: We Are Young

questions.question: In the song Harvey and Sheila, Sheila was so excited that she decided to get a dog. What kind of dog did she finally purchase?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: white French poodle

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Country and Eurovision Song Contest
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, country, nations. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what year and in what country was the first Eurovision Song Contest held?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1956, Switzerland

questions.question: In what category did Halestrom win a Grammy Award in 2013 for their song Love Bites (So Do I)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best Hard Rock/Metal Performance

questions.question: Which one of these Eurovision entries was sung in a made-up language?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sanomi

questions.question: Often, the Euro in Eurovision is ignored and nations outside Europe are eligible to participate so long as their country is in the boundaries of the European Broadcasting Area. What was the first country outside Europe to join the Eurovision Song Contest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Israel

questions.question: The winner of the 2004 Eurovision Song Contest looked like what famous female superhero?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Xena the Warrior Princess

questions.question: Which one of these countries is not part of the Big 4, the four biggest financial contributors to the European Broadcasting Union?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russia

questions.question: Which one of these Eurovision winners won the contest three times?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johhny Logan

questions.question: What singer won her 17th Grammy Award with Best Traditional RB Performance for Love on Top?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beyoncé

questions.question: What album by Paul McCartney won
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kisses on the Bottom

questions.question: In 2009 Norway set a record for most points earned at Eurovision. How many points did the Norwegian representative gather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 387

questions.question: The rule requiring countries to sing in their own national language in the Eurovision Song Contest was  abolished in 1973, but after several years the restriction was reimposed. When was this restriction lifted for the second time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1999

questions.question: Which one of these Scandinavian Eurovision entries received nul points?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mil etter mil

questions.question: Who was the winner of the first Eurovision Song Contest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lys Assia

questions.question: What performer/band is not correctly matched with the category in which they won a Grammy Award in 2013?

options.text: The Black Keys - Best Rock Performance

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carrie Underwood - Best RB Song

questions.question: This country debuted in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1964 and made 43 appearances in the period 1964-2009 without winning.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Portugal

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Interview and Shakira
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, habit, shakiras. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How did Shakira claim she felt when she was all alone at home in a 2008 interview?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Free

questions.question: Which one of these German Eurovision entries is famous for its wacky performance?

options.text: Laß die Sonne in dein Herz

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Guildo hat euch lieb!

questions.question: What type of food did Shakira state she was hopelessly addicted to in a personal 2008 interview?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chocolate

questions.question: In 2010, Germany won the Eurovision Song Contest with the song Satellite by Lena Meyer-Landrut. This is not the first time Germany has won the contest. When what the last time Germany won the contest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1982

questions.question: What is the only socialist country to join the Eurovision Song Contest during the Cold War?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yugoslavia

questions.question: What did Shakira claim to be her favorite part of her own body in a personal 2008 interview?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her brains

questions.question: What did Shakira claim to be one of her biggest fears ever in a 2008 interview?

options.text: Fear that she would forget the lyrics onstage
Fear that her bra will accidentally fall off onstage

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fear that her bra will accidentally fall off onstage

questions.question: Kalomoira, the representative of Greece in the 2008 Eurovision Song Contest, was born in what country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: United States

questions.question: Which of these was the most terrible experience in Shakiras career according to an interview she gave in 2008?

options.text: Forgetting the lyrics of her song while performing live
Being asked too personal questions in a live program

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Falling onstage

questions.question: In a 2008 interview, Shakira stated she enjoyed working with this artist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What type of men did Shakira swore she would never date in a 2008 interview?

options.text: Men who have dated some of her girlfriends
Men who cant make her laugh

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Men who have dated some of her girlfriends

questions.question: What are the songs written by Shakira mostly based on according to her confessions in a very personal 2008 interview?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her friends’ experiences

questions.question: In a 2008 interview, Shakira confessed that this was her worst unhealthy habit.

options.text: Seeing her relatives only on big holidays

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Skipping workout

questions.question: In 1978, when it was clear that Israel was going to win the Eurovision Song Contest, what did the television station of Jordan show before the winner was announced?

options.text: A photo of a bunch of daffodils
A video of an elephant dancing
A message from the king of Jordan

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A photo of a bunch of daffodils

questions.question: What is the best thing about being a celebrity according to a statement Shakira made in a 2008 interview?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Having a personal assistant

questions.question: Which set of  lyrics arent in a Collin Raye song?

options.text: I want you bad I cant help myself. But you belong to someone else. Id leave you alone. Darlin if I could. But I want you bad and that aint good
Fall into these arms of mine. Ill catch you every time you fall
Someday Ill get over you. And Ill live to see it all through. Still Ill always miss dreaming my dreams with you

options.text: This was the day theyd been waiting for
This day would be the day they would never forget
This was the day theyd waited for all their lives

I read those words just hours before my Grandma passed away

questions.question: What song are these lyrics from: Baby, I bought wine and roses on my way home. Yeah, I know we cant afford it but life doesnt last too long. This world has gone half crazy. And knocked us both to our knees. Im fumbling for the words to try and tell ya I love you for hangin on to me?
